lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho was delighted that Manchester United were on the brink of signing France midfielder Paul Pogba from Serie A champions Juventus, the Portuguese coach said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: United's Mourinho Relieved to Finally Get His Hands on Pogba
headline.main: United's Mourinho Relieved to Finally Get His Hands on Pogba

snippet: Jose Mourinho was delighted that Manchester United were on the brink of signing France midfielder Paul Pogba from Serie A champions Juventus, the Portuguese coach said on Sunday....
